entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE AND SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY

NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, INCREASING TO 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE

WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW
